CustomFieldTranslation.name: Recurring_Donation_Day_of_Month__c
CustomFieldTranslation.help: Sets the specific day of the month for future installment Opportunities when the Installment Period is Monthly. If you select 29 or 30, the installment date will be the last day of the month for months that don't have that many days.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: Recurring Donation Day of Month
